calcImpliedProbability(uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculates implied probability of the trader, used to update the reputation score by brier scoring mechanism

expectedRepGain(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: given a hypoethetical bond price, calculate how much reputation one will gain

filterTraders(uint256,address).notice: returns a list of top X percentile traders excluding the utilizer.

recordPull(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: record for reputation updates whenever trader buys longZCB

recordPush(address,uint256,uint256,bool,.notice: updates reputation whenever trader redeems  param premature is true if trader redeems/sells before maturity  param redeemAmount is 0 if !perpetual, since for those traders will redeem all at once
